mapper.select: SELECT dsd.order_split_id AS orderSplitId, dsd.number, dsd.send_time, sum(dosi.shop_count) as shopCount, dsd.total_amount as totalAmount FROM dj_deliver_split_deliver dsd INNER JOIN dj_deliver_order_split_item dosi ON dsd.id = dosi.split_deliver_id WHERE dsd.house_id = #{houseId} AND dsd.supplier_id = #{supId} and dsd.city_id=#{cityId} GROUP BY dsd.number

SELECT dsd.house_id as houseId, dsd.ship_address as shipAddress, dsd.supplier_id as supId, sum(dosi.num) as supplyQuantity, sum(sup_cost) as income FROM dj_deliver_order_split_item dosi INNER JOIN dj_deliver_split_deliver dsd ON dsd.id = dosi.split_deliver_id WHERE dosi.product_id = #{productId} AND dsd.supplier_id = #{supId} and dosi.city_id=#{cityId} GROUP BY dsd.house_id

SELECT dsd.storefront_id AS shopId, sum(dosi.num) as totalNumberSupply, sum(total_price) as income, dsd.supplier_id as supId FROM dj_deliver_split_deliver dsd INNER JOIN dj_deliver_order_split_item dosi ON dsd.id = dosi.split_deliver_id WHERE dsd.supplier_id =#{supId} and dsd.storefront_id =#{shopId} and dsd.city_id=#{cityId} GROUP BY dsd.storefront_id
